column2: tons of vegetarian options. My favorites include: sea food paella
column3: it's fresh and the huge portion is easily sharable by 4-5 people. The market salad is delicious with the textures all playing well together. The spicy potatoes and goat cheese in tomato sauce actually pair well together
column4: who doesn't like high-carb foods? I've also never been disappointed with the chef's specials
column5: so be sure to hear them out.
